name: GoAlone (Tri-Powered Games)
description:
Just a short, single level experience exploring a new concept of integrating 2.5D combat in a 3D forest, side scrolling hack and slash, so to speak, but only in certain places. Created by a developer from Hawke Gaming and myself. Let us know what you think.

Being chased by the enemy, you are forced to take a shortcut through a dangerous forest. Are your timing skills up to par to fight the darkness that lies ahead? Secure your freedom!

Pickup ancient power along the way to help you defeat the evil that has taken over the forest, or die trying.

---

Try to time your attacks appropriately to hit combos, as you collect shrine powers you will become faster and stronger, and need to adjust timing, good luck, and watch for enemy attack patterns! 

---

Requires KEYBOARD/MOUSE

Free Traversal Mode Movement => W/A/S/D

Combat Mode Movement => A/D ( LEFT/RIGHT; 2.5D combat )

Attack => Left Click on Mouse

Dodge => Spacebar

Assisted by Hawke Gaming
